menu_item.description: organic butter lettuce with apples, blood oranges, gorgonzola, and raspberry vinaigrette.
lightly sauteed in sesame oil with baby bok choi, portobello mushrooms, and scallions.
served with new potatoes, diced beets, Italian parlsey, and lemon zest.
creamy traditional cheesecake topped with dark chocolate sauce and strawberries.
